Key Match Events: The series is crucial for both teams as preparation for the T20 World Cup in Australia next month
Pre-Game Insights: England's tour of Pakistan is their first in 17 years and was initially postponed due to security concerns. The team is led by Moeen Ali as Jos Buttler recovers from a knee injury. The series will be played in Karachi and Lahore, with England aiming to test their skills in these conditions before the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The tour is a significant event for both teams, with England focusing on adapting to local conditions and Pakistan looking to overcome recent batting struggles
